dmca.title: San Miguel Guide complains Ad link guides to copy
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern -

I am writing you regarding an apparent copyright violation by a Google AdSense publisher using the adsense publisher id pub-934002273281901. Google AdSense advertisements appear on pages with content that I believe infringes on my copyright.

Content from my website, www.sanmiguelguide.com has been copied and republished on the website www.cya.net without my permission.

Text from a page of my site www.sanmiguelguide.com has been copied and republished on this publisher's site at the following url.

http://www.cya.net/cultural/?ContentID=620

Essentially the content of the article is a verbatim copy of an article published on the page http://www.sanmiguelguide.com/grito-de-independencia.htm which was written for my website in 2003 by an employee.

I have a good faith belief that the use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.


[private]
[private]
Laredo, TX 78045
Telephone: [private]
[private]
